amendment.description: To provide funding for interoperable communications equipment grants.

action.text: Amendment SA 1217 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Stabenow.
Point of order that an emergency designation within the amendment violates the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1217.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1217 made in Senate.

Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1217 (the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 63. Record Vote Number: 183.
The emergency designation within amendment SA 1217 was stricken.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1217 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
